value.title: Count of Unique Values DistinctCount in Power BI Through Power Query Group By Transformation

value.title: Page Level Security workaround in Power BI

value.title: Power BI From and To Date Filtering with One Slicer

value.title: Power BI Report Server   Power BI On Premises Hosting
value.excerpt: Power BI is not only a cloud-based reporting technology. Power BI on-premises hosting is called Power BI Report Server. This post concerns using

value.title: Set Power BI Data Color   All Visuals to Follow Same Color for the Same Data Point

value.title: Use DAX time intelligence functions in Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: By the end of this module, you'll learn the meaning of time intelligence and how to add time intelligence DAX calculations to your model. These calculations will include year-to-date (YTD), year-over-year (YoY) growth, and others.
